meanings.definition: A chief or leader of a Native American tribe
meanings.sent1: The sagamores gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: The sagamores led their tribe with wisdom and strength.
meanings.sent3: The sagamores decided to have a dance-off to determine the new leader.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the sagamores stood tall like ancient trees, guiding their people.
meanings.sent5: The word 'sagamores' always reminds me of the respected tribal leaders.

meanings.definition: A title of honor among some Native American tribes
meanings.sent1: The young warrior received the title of sagamores for his bravery.
meanings.sent2: The sagamores were respected by all for their courage and wisdom.
meanings.sent3: During the ceremony, everyone cheered for the new sagamores.
meanings.sent4: The title of sagamores shone brightly, symbolizing honor and respect.
meanings.sent5: Wearing the title of sagamores, he felt a deep sense of pride and responsibility.
